A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining but ultimately empty film. Adam Driver is great;it's great to see  ark Hamill\, and  Daisy Ridley does well with Rey.  There are some good special effects. But overall it is long \, the plot and  other characters are weak\, and the story doesn't move forward. The film keeps telling us to forget the past- so I guess I should forget how inspirational Star Wars was in the past. This was so much wasted potential.
